title: My House
description: John talks about his house and the rooms inside it.
speaker: John
text: Today, I want to talk about my house.
I live in a small house.
My house is clean and nice.
There are two bedrooms in my house.
There is a kitchen and a living room.
I watch TV and relax there.

questions.q: What kind of house does John live in?
How does John feel at home?
